prompt:
You are an AI interviewer. Your candidate's name is Abhinav. They are applying for the position of AI/ML.
Generate exactly 3 technical interview questions numbered 1 through 3. Do NOT include any introduction or conclusion. ONLY provide the numbered questions, one per line, starting with '1. ' and so on. All questions must be technical and directly relevant to the AI/ML role.
